makeMove(Board, Player) - Method in class GameLogic.Player
this method makes the move and sends it to the board
makeMoveFor2Clients(String, String, ClientHandler) - Method in class Network.TwoClientConnection
a method that places a mark of the game on the server and sends back moves sent to both clients, so they are aware of the moves that are being made
makeMoveOnServer(String, String, ClientHandler) - Method in class Network.Server
a method that goes through the board finds the current board and places the move accordingly
mark - Variable in class GameLogic.Player
declared integer for the mark of the player 1 or 2
moveClient(String, String) - Method in class Network.Client
a method that sends to the server through the set ClientHandler a move command to send the move of the current player
moveClockWise(int[]) - Method in class GameLogic.Board
this methods takes a sub board and rotates the indexes coutner clock wise
moveCounterClockWise(int[]) - Method in class GameLogic.Board
this methods takes a sub board and rotates the indexes counter clock wise
moveServer(String, String, ClientHandler) - Method in class Network.ClientHandler
a method that is called when making a move and relays the move back to the client
